channel.title: Bandelier National Monument on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Bandelier National Monument on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Exit of Bandelier National Monument at NM-4
item.description: Exit of Bandelier National Monument at NM-4. Turn left on NM-4 for Valles Caldera National Reserve, and Jemez State Monument. The smaller green sign in the background is a standard kind posted around Los Alamos. Turn left on NM-4 for Los Alamos and Jemez Mountains. Turn right for White Rock and Santa Fe.
